description: Get a load of this turkey and Asian greens stir-fry with a spicy kung pao sauce that packs a punch. Midweek meals just got a whole lot spicier!
name: Kung Pao Turkey & Greens Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add sauce and 2 tbs water. Stir-fry for 2 minutes or until heated through. Divide rice among bowls. Top with mince mixture, onion and chilli. Serve with lime wedges.
